attributes.additional_details: School is for learning and home is for relaxing and revision, and when you are at home you can revise subjects that you want to and do things that you like. This would also reduce stress and help your mental health.
attributes.background: home work for schools should not be compulsory but instead make school time go on for longer, depending on how behind the student is; 1 hour max. This would also motivate the students into working harder.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603551
